languages.text: "Но там же, в кабинете, был благородный архмилитант. Вернейший слуга Императора, который вытащил меня с Салис Прайм после нападения культистов. Увидев, как я стреляю в Теодору, он инстинктивно рванулся на ее защиту. Я убила его тоже". {n}Арджента на мгновение опускает взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Но там же, в кабинете, был благородный архмилитант. Вернейший слуга Императора, который вытащил меня с Салис Прайм после нападения культистов. Увидев, как я стреляю в Теодору, он инстинктивно рванулся на ее защиту. Я убила его тоже". {n}Арджента на мгновение опускает взгляд.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "But standing in that same room was the honourable Arch-Militant. A devout servant of the Emperor, and the reason I had made it off Salis Prime after the cultist attack. When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но там же, в кабинете, был благородный архмилитант. Вернейший слуга Императора, который вытащил меня с Салис Прайм после нападения культистов. Увидев, как я стреляю в Теодору, он инстинктивно рванулся на ее защиту. Я убила его тоже". {n}Арджента на мгновение опускает взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "But in that same study, there was the honourable Arch-Militant. A devout servant of the Emperor who was the reason I made it off Salis Prime after the cultist attack. When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}

When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}

When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}

When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But standing in that same room was the honourable Arch-Militant. A devout servant of the Emperor, and the reason I had made it off Salis Prime after the cultist attack. When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「だけど同じ部屋に、尊敬すべきアーク・ミリタントが立っていた。敬虔な皇帝のしもべ。魔女団の襲撃の後、私がサリス・プライムから脱出できたのは彼のおかげよ。私がシオドーラに向かって発砲するのを見ると、本能的に彼女を守ろうと駆け寄ってきた。だから彼のことも殺したわ」{n}アルジェンタは一瞬視線を落とす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But standing in that same room was the honourable Arch-Militant. A devout servant of the Emperor, and the reason I had made it off Salis Prime after the cultist attack. When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「だけど同じ部屋に、尊敬すべきアーク・ミリタントが立っていた。敬虔な皇帝のしもべ。魔女団の襲撃の後、私がサリス・プライムから脱出できたのは彼のおかげよ。私がシオドーラに向かって発砲するのを見ると、本能的に彼女を守ろうと駆け寄ってきた。だから彼のことも殺したわ」{n}アルジェンタは一瞬視線を落とす。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “然而，尊敬的首席战士也在那间屋子里。他是帝皇虔诚的仆人，当初我在萨利斯主星遭到邪教徒袭击的时候，也是他救了我一命。当他看到我朝西奥多拉开枪时，他本能地冲上去保护她，于是我把他也杀了。”{n}阿洁塔低下了头，一言不发。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But standing in that same room was the honourable Arch-Militant. A devout servant of the Emperor, and the reason I had made it off Salis Prime after the cultist attack. When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “然而，尊敬的首席战士也在那间屋子里。他是帝皇虔诚的仆人，当初我在萨利斯主星遭到邪教徒袭击的时候，也是他救了我一命。当他看到我朝西奥多拉开枪时，他本能地冲上去保护她，于是我把他也杀了。”{n}阿洁塔低下了头，一言不发。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Pero en esa misma habitación estaba el honorable Archimilitante, un devoto siervo del Emperador, que además fue la razón por la que conseguí salir de Salis Prime después del ataque de los cultistas. Cuando me vio disparando a Theodora, instintivamente corrió a protegerla. También lo maté». {n}Argenta baja la mirada un instante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But standing in that same room was the honourable Arch-Militant. A devout servant of the Emperor, and the reason I had made it off Salis Prime after the cultist attack. When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero en esa misma habitación estaba el honorable Archimilitante, un devoto siervo del Emperador que fue la razón por la que conseguí salir de Salis Prime después del ataque de los cultistas. Cuando me vio disparando a Theodora, instintivamente corrió a protegerla. También lo maté». {n}Argenta baja la mirada un instante.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Aber im selben Raum stand auch noch der ehrenwerte Erzmilitant. Einen treuen Diener des Imperators, und der Grund, warum ich nach dem Angriff der Kultisten von Salis Prime entkommen konnte. Als er sah, wie ich auf Theodora feuerte, eilte er instinktiv herbei, um sie zu beschützen. Ich habe auch ihn getötet." {n}Argenta senkt kurz den Blick.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But standing in that same room was the honourable Arch-Militant. A devout servant of the Emperor, and the reason I had made it off Salis Prime after the cultist attack. When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber im selben Raum gab es auch noch den ehrenwerten Erzmilitanten. Einen treuen Diener des Imperators, durch den ich nach dem Angriff der Kultisten von Salis Prime entkommen konnte. Als er sah, wie ich auf Theodora feuerte, eilte er instinktiv herbei, um sie zu beschützen. Ich habe auch ihn getötet." {n}Argenta senkt kurz den Blick.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Malheureusement, l'archimilitant était également présent. C'était un fervent partisan de l'Empereur, et si j'ai pu me sortir vivante de l'attaque des cultistes sur Salis Primus, c'est grâce à lui. Quand il m'a vue tirer sur Théodora, il s'est instinctivement interposé pour la protéger. Alors, je l'ai tué, lui aussi. » {n}Argenta baisse les yeux un instant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But standing in that same room was the honourable Arch-Militant. A devout servant of the Emperor, and the reason I had made it off Salis Prime after the cultist attack. When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, l'archimilitant était également présent. C'était un fervent partisan de l'Empereur, et si j'ai pu me sortir vivante de l'attaque des cultistes sur Salis Primus, c'est uniquement grâce à lui. Quand il m'a vue tirer sur Théodora, il s'est instinctivement interposé pour la protéger. Alors, je l'ai tué, lui aussi. » {n}Argenta baisse les yeux un instant.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Lakin aynı odada muhterem Başmilitan da vardı. Kendisi İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârıydı, tarikatçı saldırısından sonra Salis Prime'dan kaçmamı da o sağlamıştı. Silahımı ateşlediğimi görünce doğal olarak Theodora'yı korumaya çalıştı. Onu da öldürdüm." {n}Argenta, bir an için başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But standing in that same room was the honourable Arch-Militant. A devout servant of the Emperor, and the reason I had made it off Salis Prime after the cultist attack. When he saw me firing at Theodora, he instinctively rushed to protect her. I killed him too." {n}Argenta lowers her gaze for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lakin aynı odada muhterem Başmilitan da vardı. Kendisi İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârıydı, tarikatçı saldırısından sonra Salis Prime'dan kaçmamı da o sağlamıştı. Silahımı ateşlediğimi görünce doğal olarak Theodora'yı korumaya çalıştı. Onu da öldürdüm." {n}Argenta, bir an için başını eğiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
